name: Why role="button" is not enough
description: The attribute role="button" is often used in place of a native <button> element, yet this is not enough to ensure the element is actually accessible.

name: Partial links are inaccessible
description: Partial links are the bane of the internet, so why are they so common?

name: How accessible are emojis?
description: Emojis are unavoidable. Let's see how accessible they truly are on the web.
